patthana18.20:1.1: Āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana18.20:2.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo nahetu
patthana18.20:2.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana18.20:3.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo nanahetu
patthana18.20:3.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto
patthana18.20:3.1_2: nasāsavo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
